title: Utility spells

properties.name: description
properties.value: Utility spells are a type of magic spell typically used by players outside of combat, such as enchanting items or reanimating ensouled heads. Ancient Magicks are the only spellbook that does not have utility spells, as it is a combat-oriented spellbook.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Skilling spells

Utility spells are a type of magic spell typically used by players outside of combat, such as enchanting items or reanimating ensouled heads. Ancient Magicks are the only spellbook that does not have utility spells, as it is a combat-oriented spellbook.

Contents

  • 1 Standard spellbook
    • 1.1 Alchemy spells
    • 1.2 Enchantment spells
    • 1.3 Enchant Crossbow Bolt
    • 1.4 Other spells
  • 2 Arceuus spellbook
    • 2.1 Reanimation spells
    • 2.2 Offering spells
    • 2.3 Other spells
  • 3 Lunar spellbook

Standard spellbook[edit | edit source]

The standard spellbook has various sub-types of utility spells.

Alchemy spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Members Effect
Bones to Bananas 15 2 2 1 25 0
 Converts all normal bones in the inventory into bananas.
Low Level Alchemy 21 3 1 31 0
 Gives coins equal to ⌊ 0.4 × V a l u e ⌋ {\displaystyle \left\lfloor 0.4\times Value\right\rfloor } of the item the spell was cast on.
Superheat Item 43 4 1 53 0
 Smelts ore into bars without need of a furnace. Iron ore's success rate is 100% when used with this spell.
High Level Alchemy 55 5 1 65 0
 Gives coins equal to ⌊ 0.6 × V a l u e ⌋ {\displaystyle \left\lfloor 0.6\times Value\right\rfloor } of the item the spell was cast on.
Bones to Peaches 60 2 4 2 65 1
 Converts all normal bones in the inventory into peaches. Must be unlocked at the Mage Training Arena.

Enchantment spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Members Effect
Lvl-1 Enchant 7 1 1 17.5 0
 Enchants jewellery made from sapphire and opal.
Lvl-2 Enchant 27 3 1 37 0
 Enchants jewellery made from emerald and jade.
Lvl-3 Enchant 49 5 1 59 0
 Enchants jewellery made from ruby and red topaz.
Charge Water Orb 56 30 3 1 56 1
 Enchants an unpowered orb into a water orb when cast at the Obelisk of Water.
Lvl-4 Enchant 57 10 1 67 0
 Enchants jewellery made from diamond.
Charge Earth Orb 60 30 3 1 70 1
 Enchants an unpowered orb into an earth orb when cast at the Obelisk of Earth.
Charge Fire Orb 63 30 3 1 73 1
 Enchants an unpowered orb into a fire orb when cast at the Obelisk of Fire.
Charge Air Orb 66 30 3 1 76 1
 Enchants an unpowered orb into an air orb when cast at the Obelisk of Air.
Lvl-5 Enchant 68 15 15 1 78 1
 Enchants jewellery made from dragonstone.
Lvl-6 Enchant 87 20 20 1 97 1
 Enchants jewellery made from onyx.
Lvl-7 Enchant 93 20 1 20 110 1
 Enchants jewellery made from zenyte.

Enchant Crossbow Bolt[edit | edit source]

Icon Spell Level Runes XP Notes
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Opal) 4 2 1
10 		9 Enchants opal bolts into opal bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Sapphire) 7 1 1 1
10 		17.5 Enchants sapphire bolts into sapphire bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Jade) 14 2 1
10 		19 Enchants jade bolts into jade bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Pearl) 24 2 1
10 		29 Enchants pearl bolts into pearl bolts (e).
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Emerald) 27 3 1 1
10 		37 Enchants emerald bolts into emerald bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz) 29 2 1
10 		33 Enchants topaz bolts into topaz bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Ruby) 49 5 1 1
10 		59 Enchants ruby bolts into ruby bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond) 57 10 1 2
10 		67 Enchants diamond bolts into diamond bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Dragonstone) 68 15 1 1
10 		78 Enchants dragonstone bolts into dragonstone bolts (e), 10 at a time.
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Onyx) 87 20 1 1
10 		97 Enchants onyx bolts into onyx bolts (e), 10 at a time.

Other spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Members Effect
Telekinetic Grab 33 1 1 43 0
 Remotely takes an item laying on the ground or on a table. Can be cast through barriers such as fences and jail cell bars, but not through solid objects like doors or walls.

Arceuus spellbook[edit | edit source]

With the exception of reanimation spells, all utility spells require completion of the quest A Kingdom Divided to cast.

Reanimation spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Effect
Basic Reanimation 16 4 2 32 Reanimates the ensouled head of a low levelled creature.
Adept Reanimation 41 4 3 1 80 Reanimates the ensouled head of a medium levelled creature.
Expert Reanimation 72 1 3 2 138 Reanimates the ensouled head of a high levelled creature.
Master Reanimation 90 2 4 4 170 Reanimates the ensouled head of a very high levelled creature.

Offering spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Effect
Demonic Offering 84 1 1 175 Converts up to three sets of ashes to prayer points and grants three times the normal experience for scattering ashes.
Sinister Offering 92 1 1 180 Converts up to three sets of bones to prayer points and grants three times the normal experience for burying bones.

Other spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Effect
Shadow Veil 47 5 5 5 58 Grants a 15% chance (40% if wearing the dodgy necklace) to avoid being stunned and damaged while pickpocketing NPCs for a set amount of time.
Vile Vigour 66 3 1 76 Converts remaining prayer points into run energy at a 1:1 ratio.
Degrime 70 4 2 83 Cleans all grimy herbs in the player's inventory that the player has the Herblore level to clean.
Resurrect Crops 78 25 8 12 8 90 Gives a chance for a dead farming patch to be brought back to life. If the spell fails, the patch is cleared out.
Death Charge 80 1 1 1 90 Restores 15% of the player's special attack energy upon killing a monster.

Lunar spellbook[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes XP Type
Bake Pie 65 5 4 1 60 Automatically bakes all uncooked pies in the player's inventory, one after another, without risk of burning. The player receives full cooking experience.
Geomancy 65 8 3 3 60 Allows the player to view the status of every single farmable patch in the game, excluding ones used during quests.
Cure Plant 66 8 1 60 Cures a diseased Farming patch.
NPC Contact 67 2 1 1 63 Allows players to telepathically speak to a set of non-player characters as if they were next to them.
Humidify 68 1 3 1 65 Fills all the vessels in the player's inventory with water. The spell can also water all seedlings in the player's inventory.
Hunter Kit 71 2 2 70 Gives the player a hunter kit containing various tools used in training Hunter.
Spin Flax 76 5 1 2 75 Instantly spins up to five flax into bow strings in the player's inventory.
Superglass Make 77 10 6 2 78 Turns all buckets of sand and soda ash, seaweed, or swamp weed into molten glass instantly and without the need for a furnace.
Tan Leather 78 5 2 1 81 Tans up to five hides in the player's inventory, without the usual cost associated with tanners. Requires completion of the Hard Fremennik Diary.
String Jewellery 80 10 5 2 83 Unstrung amulets in the player's inventory immediately become strung (one per spell).
Magic Imbue 82 7 7 2 86 Enables the player to create combination runes without needing to use opposing talismans for 12.6 seconds.
Fertile Soil 83 15 3 2 87 This spell treats the targeted Farming patch with supercompost, or ultracompost if players have read the ash covered tome and have two volcanic ash in their inventory.
Plank Make 86 15 2 1 90 Turns one log into a plank. The spell charges a decreased fee for making each plank in comparison to sawmill operators.
Recharge Dragonstone 89 4 1 1 97.5 Recharges all enchanted dragonstone jewellery (excluding ring of wealth). Requires completion of the Hard Fremennik Diary.
Spellbook Swap 96 3 2 1 130 Lets players switch to another spellbook for one spell cast.

rawContent:
{{External|rs=Skilling spells}} '''Utility spells''' are a type of magic spell typically used by players outside of combat, such as enchanting items or reanimating [[ensouled head]]s. [[Ancient Magicks]] are the only spellbook that does not have utility spells, as it is a combat-oriented spellbook. ==Standard spellbook== The [[standard spellbook]] has various sub-types of utility spells. ===Alchemy spells=== {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; width:850px;" !class="unsortable"|Icon ! class="unsortable" |[[Mobile]]

[[Iron ore]]'s success rate is 100% when used with this spell. |- |[[File:High Level Alchemy.png]] |[[File:High Level Alchemy icon (mobile).png]] |[[High Level Alchemy]] |55 |{{RuneReq|Fire=5|Nature=1}} |65 |{{members|no}} | style="text-align: left;" | Gives [[coins]] equal to \left \lfloor 0.6 \times Value \right \rfloor of the item the spell was cast on. |- |[[File:Bones to Peaches.png]] |[[File:Bones to Peaches icon (mobile).png]] |[[Bones to Peaches]] |60 |{{RuneReq|Water=4|Earth=2|Nature=2}} |65 |{{members|yes}} | style="text-align: left;" | Converts all normal [[bones]] in the inventory into [[peach]]es. The player receives full cooking experience. |- |[[File:Geomancy.png]] |[[File:Geomancy icon (mobile).png]] |[[Geomancy]] |65 |{{RuneReq|Nature=3|Astral=3|Earth=8}} |60 | style="text-align: left;" | Allows the player to view the status of every single farmable patch in the game, excluding ones used during [[quests]]. |- |[[File:Cure Plant.png]] |[[File:Cure Plant icon (mobile).png]] |[[Cure Plant]] |66 |{{RuneReq|Astral=1|Earth=8}} |60 | style="text-align: left;" | Cures a diseased [[Farming]] patch. |- |[[File:NPC Contact.png]] |[[File:NPC Contact icon (mobile).png]] |[[NPC Contact]] |67 |{{RuneReq|Astral=1|Cosmic=1|Air=2}} |63 | style="text-align: left;" | Allows players to telepathically speak to a set of [[non-player character]]s as if they were next to them. |- |[[File:Humidify.png]] |[[File:Humidify icon (mobile).png]] |[[Humidify]] |68 |{{RuneReq|Astral=1|Water=3|Fire=1}} |65 | style="text-align: left;" | Fills all the vessels in the player's inventory with water. The spell can also water all seedlings in the player's inventory. |- |[[File:Hunter Kit.png]] |[[File:Hunter Kit icon (mobile).png]] |[[Hunter Kit (spell)|Hunter Kit]] |71 |{{RuneReq|Astral=2|Earth=2}} |70 | style="text-align: left;" | Gives the player a [[hunter kit]] containing various tools used in training [[Hunter]]. |- |[[File:Spin Flax.png]] |[[File:Spin Flax icon (mobile).png]] |[[Spin Flax]] |76 |{{RuneReq|Astral=1|Nature=2|Air=5}} |75 | style="text-align: left;" | Instantly spins up to five [[flax]] into [[bow string]]s in the player's inventory. |- |[[File:Superglass Make.png]] |[[File:Superglass Make icon (mobile).png]] |[[Superglass Make]] |77 |{{RuneReq|Astral=2|Fire=6|Air=10}} |78 | style="text-align: left;" | Turns all [[buckets of sand]] and [[soda ash]], [[seaweed]], or [[swamp weed]] into [[molten glass]] instantly and without the need for a [[furnace]]. |- |[[File:Tan Leather.png]] |[[File:Tan Leather icon (mobile).png]] |[[Tan Leather]] |78 |{{RuneReq|Nature=1|Fire=5|Astral=2}} |81 | style="text-align: left;" | Tans up to five hides in the player's inventory, without the usual cost associated with [[tanner]]s. Requires completion of the [[Hard Fremennik Diary]]. |- |[[File:String Jewellery.png]] |[[File:String Jewellery icon (mobile).png]] |[[String Jewellery]] |80 |{{RuneReq|Astral=2|Earth=10|Water=5}} |83 | style="text-align: left;" | Unstrung amulets in the player's inventory immediately become strung (one per spell). |- |[[File:Magic Imbue.png]] |[[File:Magic Imbue icon (mobile).png]] |[[Magic Imbue]] |82 |{{RuneReq|Astral=2|Fire=7|Water=7}} |86 | style="text-align: left;" | Enables the player to create [[combination runes]] without needing to use opposing [[talisman]]s for 12.6 seconds. |- |[[File:Fertile Soil.png]] |[[File:Fertile Soil icon (mobile).png]] |[[Fertile Soil]] |83 |{{RuneReq|Astral=3|Earth=15|Nature=2}} |87 | style="text-align: left;" | This spell treats the targeted [[Farming]] patch with [[supercompost]], or [[ultracompost]] if players have read the [[ash covered tome]] and have two [[volcanic ash]] in their inventory. |- |[[File:Plank Make.png]] |[[File:Plank Make icon (mobile).png]] |[[Plank Make]] |86 |{{RuneReq|Astral=2|Nature=1|Earth=15}} |90 | style="text-align: left;" | Turns one log into a plank. The spell charges a decreased fee for making each plank in comparison to [[sawmill operator]]s. |- |[[File:Recharge Dragonstone.png]] |[[File:Recharge Dragonstone icon (mobile).png]] |[[Recharge Dragonstone]] |89 |{{RuneReq|Soul=1|Astral=1|Water=4}} |97.5 | style="text-align: left;" | Recharges all enchanted [[dragonstone]] [[jewellery]] (excluding [[ring of wealth]]). Requires completion of the [[Hard Fremennik Diary]]. |- |[[File:Spellbook Swap.png]] |[[File:Spellbook Swap icon (mobile).png]] |[[Spellbook Swap]] |96 |{{RuneReq|Astral=3|Cosmic=2|Law=1}} |130 | style="text-align: left;" | Lets players switch to another [[spellbook]] for one spell cast. |} {{Utility spells}}
